to membership4@aaas.org Both foreign nationals and U.S. citizens may apply to the program. Expenses for travel within the Outside the U.S.: +44 (0) 1223 326 515 U.S. and for room and board will be covered for those selected for the program. Successful applicants from outside the U.S. must provide for their travel to and from the U.S. Course sponsors are the NASA Space Radiation Health Project
